nodes.text: The Alderaanian waltz was a form of dance that originated on Alderaan. During the dance, conservative couples formed a circle, while more proficient ones raised their hands together and spin in relation to one another, males to their left and females to their right, coming around to face one another on the same beat of the music. Wraith Squadron participated in the Alderaanian waltz during a dance organized by Hohass Ekwesh to boost the squadron's morale prior to the Battle of Kuat.
